questions.question: What does fabric count refer to?
choices: The number of colors in a fabric
The number of warp and weft yarns per unit area
The total number of fabrics produced
The weight of the fabric in grams
questions.answer: The number of warp and weft yarns per unit area

questions.question: Which unit is commonly used to measure fabric weight?
What does a higher cover factor indicate?
What is the primary purpose of scouring in wet finishing?
choices: To add color to the fabric
To remove impurities from the fabric
To add stretch to the fabric
questions.answer: To remove impurities from the fabric

questions.question: Which wet finishing process is primarily used for wool fabrics?
What is the purpose of tentering in fabric finishing?
choices: To add color to the fabric
To stretch the fabric to a specific width
questions.answer: To stretch the fabric to a specific width
